name: HealthPlanOne
headline: Medicare & Health Plan Enrollment Partner
blurb: Connect to Medicare and health plan options with licensed agents and guided enrollment.
lock_msg: Get at least halfway through your Guided Care Plan to see tailored plan options.

name: Omcare
headline: Home Health & Medication Management Hub
blurb: Automated dispensing with visual adherence plus telehealth and remote monitoring.
lock_msg: Your plan must indicate medication management needs to unlock Omcare.

name: SeniorLife.AI
headline: Mobility & Wellness Insights with AI
blurb: AI-driven mobility metrics and wellness tracking; FDA-registered software device for mobility assessment.
lock_msg: Reach 50% progress in your Guided Care Plan to personalize AI insights.

name: Lantern
headline: Specialty & Infusion Care Network
blurb: High-performance network for surgery, oncology, and infusion therapies with curated access.
lock_msg: Reach at least halfway through your plan to view specialty care options.

name: National Council on Aging (NCOA)
headline: Medicaid & Assisted Living Coverage Guide
blurb: Understand how Medicaid can help pay for assisted living through waivers, state plans, and the costs families still manage.

name: Home Instead
headline: Personalized In-Home Care & Support
blurb: Professional caregivers providing personalized in-home assistance, respite, companionship, and safety planning for older adults.
